sentences.en: In view of the above, the transformation properties of astigmatic elliptic Gaussian beams are analysed overall, the exact formulas of correcting astigmatism and rotary symmetrize transformation.
sentences.cn: 分析像散椭圆高斯光束的传输变换特性，推导出半导体激光束的像散校正与旋转对称化变换公式。

sentences.en: The resonator ( astigmatic ) can be compensated by inserting a suitable thickness Brewster plate in the cavity.
sentences.cn: 在腔内插入一定厚度的布儒斯特片可以部分消除腔的像散.

sentences.en: Using astigmatic method to extract information of light source in z axis.
sentences.cn: 用散光的方法来提取光源在Z轴上的位置。

sentences.en: When the astigmatic degree< 1.50D, mydriatic optometry is of help to found the axis of cylindrical lens.
sentences.cn: 对于合并1.50D以下的散光患儿，散瞳验光可能更有助于确定柱镜的轴向。

words.tran_cn: [眼科] 散光；[光][电子] 像散性；[光][电子] 像散现象

trans.tran_cn: 散光的，矫正散光的，歪曲（或无视）事实的
trans.tran_en: relating to or affected with astigmatism
